about_store:
We cultivate bonsais longer than 10 years, with
traditional techniques and deliver to all Brazil.
Our goal is to provide balance, beauty and nature
to your home.
care_and_tips:
Learn how to keep your bonsai always
healthy: correct watering, pruning, fertilization and ideal
lighting.
newsletter_text:
Register your email and stay on top of promotions and
new products
tip_watering_title: Tip 1 - Water in the right measure
tip_watering_text:
Water only when the top layer
of soil is dry to the touch.
tip_prune_text:
Pruning helps with the health and aesthetics of the
bonsai. Use appropriate scissors.
tip_light_exposition_text:
Leave your bonsai in a place with indirect light
and avoid strong sun during the hottest hours.
tip_fertilizer_text:
Use specific fertilizers every 15 days
in the summer and monthly in the winter.
tip_ideal_place_text:
Choose an airy place, away from air
conditioning or wind currents.
tip_vase_text:
Use pots with good drainage and
ideal promotion for the size of the plant.
